item.title: More complicated EKS scenarios: EKS managed worker nodes without internet access
item.description: Are you using EKS managed worker pools? If you don’t have any specific reasons for not using them, you should. It saves tons of time plus it boosts the “managed Kubernetes” feeling. However, this pretty new offering did not cover one specific use case: cluster with no Internet access.
